content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 30, "index": 10}, {"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 57, "index": 14}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 19, "index": 16}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 50, "index": 25}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 5, "index": 33}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 23, "index": 36}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 43, "index": 37}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 18, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft a diamond_helmet, I need to move 5 diamonds from the inventory to the crafting grid. I will first move the diamond at slot 33 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 30, "index": 10}, {"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 57, "index": 14}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 19, "index": 16}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 50, "index": 25}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 23, "index": 36}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 43, "index": 37}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 18, "index": 38}]

Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 2 with quantity 1
